title: Did Ulysses S. Grant Predict This About the Next Civil War?
subtitle: "Let us begin by guarding against every enemy threatening the perpetuity of free republican institutions," President Grant advised.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: U.S. President Ulysses S. Grant predicted that the next civil war would be "between patriotism and intelligence on one side, and superstition, ambition, and ignorance on the other."
